author: Paul Rankin
method: Heat the sugar, vanilla essence and water in a pan, until it forms a caramel.  Add the banana slices to the pan, shaking to coat.  Add the butter to the pan and heat for another 1-2 minutes. Transfer the caramelised bananas to a serving plate, and drizzle with cream to serve.
ingredients: 55g/2oz caster sugar,  Â½ tsp vanilla essence,  1-2 tbsp hot water,  2 bananas, peeled and sliced,  knob of butter,  double cream
